name: Suberdeep
description:
Forewords

Suberdeep is an arcade survive-em-up with simple mechanics. All you need to do is dodge everything and stay alive. But obviously, no one’s making your life easy in the deep, deep trench, where treasures only wait for those who dare sink to the lowest of depth…

For some of us, this is the very first game built from top to finish. It turns out making a game is hard. Lots of ideas but only a few made it into the final product. Regardless, it’s what we made and we have the right to be proud of it!

Gameplay and Features:
  • “Immersive” submarine diving experience with a twist.
  • Up to 7 types of hazards, most of which are fishes. I know, right, fishes, how dangerous can they be?
  • A gun to clear off those pesky fishies. Don’t rely on it too much.
  • “Down” to 5000m of pressure, all for a few antique coins.
How to play:
  • Read the instructions in-game carefully
  • Up-down arrow: move the sub up and down
  • Left-right: make the sub face left or right
  • Spacebar: Release a torpedo
  • Avoid hazards such as fish, bombs. Your health drops on contact with those things.
  • Collect oxygen tanks to refill the health bar.
  • That's it, set your way to the 5000m seafloor!
Devlogs & credits:

Music used are:

  • Aquatic Ambiance (8-Bit Remix) - Donkey Kong Country by Tater-Tot Tunes.
